ModMetaData.name: Change Rain Sound and Volume in Patch 1.6
ModMetaData.author: Xanjin
ModMetaData.description: Allows adjusting rain sound volume live via mod settings (weather will change to clear and back to rain for a second to allow applying changes) and changes the rain sound to dmca free version - the rain sound can be changed manually to another sound replacing the Rain.ogg file under Sounds/ to an different .ogg sound file - name should be staying Rain.ogg
